body_html:
These errors looks completely random, using the same C3D model (and dataset) training crashes after ~2000 in my first run and the next one crashes after ~5500 training steps. I've tried this on multiple machines (all with Titan X) and same happens everywhere. No other processes are using the GPU.

Everythime the error message is similar and contains the MaxPool3DGrad operation.

Everythime the error message is similar and contains the MaxPool3DGrad operation.
body:
These errors looks completely random, using the same C3D model (and dataset) training crashes after ~2000 in my first run and the next one crashes after ~5500 training steps. I've tried this on multiple machines (all with Titan X) and same happens everywhere. No other processes are using the GPU.

Everythime the error message is similar and contains the `MaxPool3DGrad` operation.
